note.p: Landed proprietor. Son of George John and Ethel Romanes. Married Mima Alexandra Allan Scott (1877–1940) in Cromarty in 1905. Emigrated to Colorado Springs in America in 1910 for health reasons, but died there a few months later.

London, England, Church of England births and baptisms, 1813–1917 (Ancestry.com, accessed 20 January 2020)
